results.content: The whole course uses a file called Chart.min.js which is different from the one in the github of chart.js. The instructor refers to the file over and over again but does not say where the file can be found.
results.content_html: The whole course uses a file called Chart.min.js which is different from the one in the github of chart.js. The instructor refers to the file over and over again but does not say where the file can be found.
